title: [PAID] [$250] Profile - Account settings icon shows green dot with no other indication
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com
2. Complete onboarding (if using public domain).
3. Go to Account settings.

Expected result: There should be a notice in the relevant section if the account settings icon has a green dot.

Actual result: None
